entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Red Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:39 AM CST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -7.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Red Lake Airport 10:53 AM CST Thursday 29 December 2022
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -7.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -8.7°C
Wind: ESE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing drizzle. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of freezing drizzle or flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 18. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Thursday 29 December 2022
